CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg.B5 reads: " Scholarship Recipients - These young men and women were recipients of scholarships given by the Metoka Club at its annual scholarship garden party, July 17. Left to right, seated: Mary Jane Allen, Dorothy Gloster, Barbara Pitts, representing Thomas Pitts; Marcia Hord, representing Horrace Hord; Mattie Pinkney, Carole VeLar and Gloria Williams.  Standing: Edgar Golden, representing Joseph Golden; Henry Peyton, representing Emmitt Lee; Eugene Roberts, Mrs. Cleo Walker, representing Gloria Walker; Delores Mach, representing Clifford Mack; Arenzo Smith, Wendell Smith and Clarence Burleigh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of scholarship recipients, seated, from left: Mary Jane Allen, Dorothy Gloster, Barbara Pitts, representing Thomas Pitts; Marcia Hord, representing Horrace Hord; Mattie Pinkney, Carole VeLar, and Gloria Williams; standing, from left: Edgar Golden, representing Joseph Golden; Henry Peyton, representing Emmitt Lee; Eugene Roberts, Cleo Walker, representing Gloria Walker; Delores Mach, representing Clifford Mack; Arenzo Smith, Wendell Smith, and Clarence Burleigh, gathered on lawn for Metoka Club garden party
